api_list.name: GQL API
api_list.description: Get a token to use for all your requests.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iva-docs-apis.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iva-docs-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iva-docs-apis.p.rapidapi.com/graphql"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iva-docs-apis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
